hopobject.name: BeagleWalker
hopobject.body:
The project consist in a dog-walker robot using openCV, the robot is meant to take the dog outside for a walk in the block and take it back home with minimal intervention by a human operator(or without any intervention).
The main goal of the system is analyze the feedback between the dog and the robot, and let the dog walk only in places previously programmed by the dog's owner
